title: Heuristics Profile v1
description: Structured output for heuristic behavioral analysis of a trader wallet.

strengths.description: Positive traits or tendencies in this trader’s behavior.

weaknesses.description: Common mistakes or negative patterns in this trader’s behavior.

patterns.description: Observed behavioral or trading patterns (e.g. exits quickly, scales in).

antiPatterns.description: Behaviors that consistently lead to poor performance or losses.
